lines:
1936

August 3, 1914.

Mr. S. S. Kwan, 
c/o Pacific Nail Steamship Co.,

San Francisco, Cal.

My dear Kwan:

I can't tell you how pleased I have been to receive your letter

and to learn not only that you are bringing over some more Chinese boys for

It will be a

us, but also that you are going to nake us a visit yourself. 
real joy to see you again.

I wrote Mr. Wong immediately on receipt of your letter, and an

enclosing his reply. You will note that he gives his official approval of

the plan to place the five boys you have mentioned at Andover this fall.

You will have to leave the room assignments, I suppose, until you arrive,

but we will certainly have something satisfactory for you.

I am planning to start for the Northern woods this week.

Tormie

Lee is already up there in my brother's camp, and I hope to see a good bit

of him before the sunner is over.

Assuring you again of my pleasure at the prospect of seeing you

so soon, and thanking you for your fine letter to me during the year, letters

which both lrs. Hall and I have thoroughly enjoyed, believe me

Sincerely your old friend,
raw: 1936 August 3, 1914. Mr. S. S. Kwan, c/o Pacific Nail Steamship Co., San Francisco, Cal. My dear Kwan: I can't tell you how pleased I have been to receive your letter and to learn not only that you are bringing over some more Chinese boys for It will be a us, but also that you are going to nake us a visit yourself. real joy to see you again. I wrote Mr. Wong immediately on receipt of your letter, and an enclosing his reply. You will note that he gives his official approval of the plan to place the five boys you have mentioned at Andover this fall. You will have to leave the room assignments, I suppose, until you arrive, but we will certainly have something satisfactory for you. I am planning to start for the Northern woods this week. Tormie Lee is already up there in my brother's camp, and I hope to see a good bit of him before the sunner is over. Assuring you again of my pleasure at the prospect of seeing you so soon, and thanking you for your fine letter to me during the year, letters which both lrs. Hall and I have thoroughly enjoyed, believe me Sincerely your old friend,

metadata.name: Phillips Academy
metadata.abstract: Letter stating Stearns is delighted that Mr. Wong has sent official approval for the 5 students to study at Andover (letter enclosed-?) Stearns is on his way to the Northern Woods (his brother's camp) for the summer. And where he expects to see Tommie.
metadata.collection: Head of School (Stearns) correspondence with Chinese alumni
